text: Ana ne'mo'a vahera ozamasami'neno antri hanazaza huno, afu afa'za osu'nazaza huno, fenomo'ma agatere'nea provinsifi ufreno vahera ome rohu'reno maka fenozazamia erino agri amage'ma vanaza vahe refko huzamigahie. Hianagi amana avu'ava zana za'zatera huno ovugahianki, atupa knafi ome vagaregahie.
